title: Can Muslims shake hands with non muslims? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: sheikh my question is is it permissible to shaking hand with a disbeliever man barack obama is it permissible to shake hands with a non-muslim the answer is yes a non-muslim is like any other person we can shake hands with them we can touch them and even more than that you can marry not a non-muslim man you can marry from the people of the book so if your wife is a non-muslim you can go a little bit further i hope than uh just shaking the hands so there is no problem in that insha allah you
